item.title: Carolina Radio
item.description: Web app designed to create and manage a group listening session in Spotify

item.title: Fitting In
item.description: Race to identify and match the trends of the people around you in a hectic mall environment

item.title: Branded
item.description: Show brand loyalty in this new brand identification trivia game.

item.title: Atomic Shadows
item.description: Gripping new stealth action game where you can deconstruct the world around you

item.title: A Flowering Apocalypse
item.description: Explore a post-apocalyptic world while managing your hygiene

item.title: Clear Recipes
item.description: Web app designed to assist people with dietary restrictions

item.title: Tarheel Compass
item.description: Web app designed to assist UNC students in planning their schedules

item.title: Flux
item.description: Play as a energy-bending hero

item.title: Disruptive Dungeons
item.description: In a dystopian robot-run future, play as a captured robot, working to escape the dungeon of a gang of scrapper robots

item.title: Free Shipping
item.description: Play as a robot working to free itself from the grasp of corporate control

item.title: Slimey Dungeons
item.description: In the classic fantasy world of monsters and dungeons, play as a slime monster breaking the mold and becoming a dungeon raider

item.title: Chaindle
item.description: Variant of Wordle in which players are able to play through an infinite chain of target words

item.title: Official Cancelation of Tarheel Compass
item.description: Development on Tarheel Compass has been canceled

item.title: Game Jam Release
item.description: Introducing a new puzzle game all about fitting in
Introducing Carolina Radio!

item.title: Game Jam Release
item.description: Introducing a new stealth action game where you can deconstruct the world around you

item.title: Initial Release
item.description: Introducing a new trivia game testing your knowledge about (mostly) American corporate conglomerates

item.title: Game Jam Release
item.description: Introducing a new sandbox game built as a part of the UNC Game Dev Club’s Collegiate Game Jam
Clear Recipes has been released in Beta!

item.title: Game Jam Release
item.description: Introducing a new bullet-hell built as part of the UNC Game Dev club’s collegiate game jam.

item.title: Game Jam Release
item.description: Introducing a new dungeon crawler game built as part of the UNC Game Dev club’s collegiate game jam.

item.title: Live version taken down
item.description: The live version of the site will be down until the rewrite of the frontend is complete

item.title: Game Jam Release
item.description: Introducing a new adventure game built as part of the UNC Game Dev club’s collegiate game jam.

item.title: 0.2 - Design Update
item.description: A major design overhaul finally including support for mobile devices
Introducing Course Manager!

item.title: Performance Update
item.description: Small performance improvement

item.title: Game Jam Release
item.description: Introducing a new puzzle game built as part of the UNC Game Dev club’s collegiate game jam.
Significant bug fixes, including one resulting in improperly loading saved games

item.title: Analytics Update
item.description: In an attempt to better understand the people who play chaindle, Google Analytics was added to track usage and key actions within the game
Introducing Chaindle!
